text: Lily Renée Phillips (née Willheim; May 12, 1921 – August 24, 2022), often known as L. Renée, Lily Renée, or Reney, was an Austrian-born American artist. She best known as one of the earliest women in the comic-book industry. Her best known works were "Jane Martin", "The Werewolf Hunter", "The Lost World" and "Señorita Rio". Renée celebrated her 100th birthday in May 2021,Happy birthday, Lily Renée! and died on August 24, 2022, at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Austrian artists Category:American comics artists Category:Artists from New York City Category:American centenarians
title: Lily Renée
